mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_rcpt_ship_po_detail ( wh_id, shipment_number, po_number, line_number, item_number, schedule_number, expected_qty, received_qty, reconciled_date, status, shipment_line_number, weight, calculation_uom, property_mark, generic_field_1, generic_field_2, generic_field_3, generic_field_4, generic_field_5, generic_field_6, generic_field_7, generic_field_8, generic_field_9, generic_field_10, generic_field_11, generic_field_12, generic_field_13, generic_field_14, generic_field_15, grn_send_sign, grn_send_date, customs_is_approved, bonded_qty, free_qty, confirm_bounded, confirm_free, confirm_kit, received_bonded_qty, received_free_qty ) VALUES ( #{whId}, #{shipmentNumber}, #{poNumber}, #{lineNumber}, #{itemNumber}, #{scheduleNumber}, #{expectedQty, jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{receivedQty, jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{reconciledDate}, #{status}, #{shipmentLineNumber}, #{weight, jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{calculationUom}, #{propertyMark}, #{genericField1}, #{genericField2}, #{genericField3}, #{genericField4}, #{genericField5}, #{genericField6}, #{genericField7}, #{genericField8}, #{genericField9}, #{genericField10}, #{genericField11}, #{genericField12}, #{genericField13}, #{genericField14}, #{genericField15}, #{grnSendSign}, #{grnSendDate}, #{customsIsApproved}, #{bondedQty, jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{freeQty, jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{confirmBounded, jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{confirmFree, jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{confirmKit, jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{receivedBondedQty, jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{receivedFreeQty, jdbcType=FLOAT} )

INSERT INTO t_rcpt_ship_po_detail ( wh_id, shipment_number, po_number, line_number, item_number, schedule_number, expected_qty, received_qty, reconciled_date, status, shipment_line_number, weight, calculation_uom, property_mark, generic_field_1, generic_field_2, generic_field_3, generic_field_4, generic_field_5, generic_field_6, generic_field_7, generic_field_8, generic_field_9, generic_field_10, generic_field_11, generic_field_12, generic_field_13, generic_field_14, generic_field_15, grn_send_sign, grn_send_date, customs_is_approved, bonded_qty, free_qty, confirm_bounded, confirm_free, confirm_kit, received_bonded_qty, received_free_qty ) VALUES
( #{item.whId}, #{item.shipmentNumber}, #{item.poNumber}, #{item.lineNumber}, #{item.itemNumber}, #{item.scheduleNumber}, #{item.expectedQty, jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{item.receivedQty, jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{item.reconciledDate}, #{item.status}, #{item.shipmentLineNumber}, #{item.weight, jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{item.calculationUom}, #{item.propertyMark}, #{item.genericField1}, #{item.genericField2}, #{item.genericField3}, #{item.genericField4}, #{item.genericField5}, #{item.genericField6}, #{item.genericField7}, #{item.genericField8}, #{item.genericField9}, #{item.genericField10}, #{item.genericField11}, #{item.genericField12}, #{item.genericField13}, #{item.genericField14}, #{item.genericField15}, #{item.grnSendSign}, #{item.grnSendDate}, #{item.customsIsApproved}, #{item.bondedQty, jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{item.freeQty, jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{item.confirmBounded, jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{item.confirmFree, jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{item.confirmKit, jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{item.receivedBondedQty, jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{item.receivedFreeQty, jdbcType=FLOAT} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_rcpt_ship_po_detail SET schedule_number = #{item.scheduleNumber}, expected_qty = #{item.expectedQty, jdbcType=FLOAT}, received_qty = #{item.receivedQty, jdbcType=FLOAT}, reconciled_date = #{item.reconciledDate}, status = #{item.status}, shipment_line_number = #{item.shipmentLineNumber}, weight = #{item.weight, jdbcType=FLOAT}, calculation_uom = #{item.calculationUom}, property_mark = #{item.propertyMark}, generic_field_1 = #{item.genericField1}, generic_field_2 = #{item.genericField2}, generic_field_3 = #{item.genericField3}, generic_field_4 = #{item.genericField4}, generic_field_5 = #{item.genericField5}, generic_field_6 = #{item.genericField6}, generic_field_7 = #{item.genericField7}, generic_field_8 = #{item.genericField8}, generic_field_9 = #{item.genericField9}, generic_field_10 = #{item.genericField10}, generic_field_11 = #{item.genericField11}, generic_field_12 = #{item.genericField12}, generic_field_13 = #{item.genericField13}, generic_field_14 = #{item.genericField14}, generic_field_15 = #{item.genericField15}, grn_send_sign = #{item.grnSendSign}, grn_send_date = #{item.grnSendDate}, customs_is_approved = #{item.customsIsApproved}, bonded_qty = #{item.bondedQty, jdbcType=FLOAT}, free_qty = #{item.freeQty, jdbcType=FLOAT}, confirm_bounded = #{item.confirmBounded, jdbcType=FLOAT}, confirm_free = #{item.confirmFree, jdbcType=FLOAT}, confirm_kit = #{item.confirmKit, jdbcType=FLOAT}, received_bonded_qty = #{item.receivedBondedQty, jdbcType=FLOAT}, received_free_qty = #{item.receivedFreeQty, jdbcType=FLOAT} WHERE wh_id = #{item.whId} AND shipment_number = #{item.shipmentNumber} AND po_number = #{item.poNumber} AND line_number = #{item.lineNumber} AND item_number = #{item.itemNumber}

update.foreach: UPDATE t_rcpt_ship_po_detail SET schedule_number = #{item.scheduleNumber}, expected_qty = #{item.expectedQty, jdbcType=FLOAT}, received_qty = #{item.receivedQty, jdbcType=FLOAT}, reconciled_date = #{item.reconciledDate}, status = #{item.status}, shipment_line_number = #{item.shipmentLineNumber}, weight = #{item.weight, jdbcType=FLOAT}, calculation_uom = #{item.calculationUom}, property_mark = #{item.propertyMark}, generic_field_1 = #{item.genericField1}, generic_field_2 = #{item.genericField2}, generic_field_3 = #{item.genericField3}, generic_field_4 = #{item.genericField4}, generic_field_5 = #{item.genericField5}, generic_field_6 = #{item.genericField6}, generic_field_7 = #{item.genericField7}, generic_field_8 = #{item.genericField8}, generic_field_9 = #{item.genericField9}, generic_field_10 = #{item.genericField10}, generic_field_11 = #{item.genericField11}, generic_field_12 = #{item.genericField12}, generic_field_13 = #{item.genericField13}, generic_field_14 = #{item.genericField14}, generic_field_15 = #{item.genericField15}, grn_send_sign = #{item.grnSendSign}, grn_send_date = #{item.grnSendDate}, customs_is_approved = #{item.customsIsApproved}, bonded_qty = #{item.bondedQty, jdbcType=FLOAT}, free_qty = #{item.freeQty, jdbcType=FLOAT}, confirm_bounded = #{item.confirmBounded, jdbcType=FLOAT}, confirm_free = #{item.confirmFree, jdbcType=FLOAT}, confirm_kit = #{item.confirmKit, jdbcType=FLOAT}, received_bonded_qty = #{item.receivedBondedQty, jdbcType=FLOAT}, received_free_qty = #{item.receivedFreeQty, jdbcType=FLOAT} WHERE wh_id = #{item.whId} AND shipment_number = #{item.shipmentNumber} AND po_number = #{item.poNumber} AND line_number = #{item.lineNumber} AND item_number = #{item.itemNumber}

mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_rcpt_ship_po_detail WHERE wh_id = #{whId} AND shipment_number = #{shipmentNumber}
